example[2]: a quietly-spoken man  (=one who always speaks quietly)
definition[1]: in a way that does not attract attention
example[3]: The mayor had been aiming to quietly turn over control of the city’s water to private business interests.
example[4]: The government hoped that their early mishandling of the crisis could be quietly forgotten.
example[5]: Now are you gonna come quietly, or do I have to use force?
example[6]: Speculation is growing that Grogan will be replaced at the end of the season, and he is unlikely to go quietly.
